website_summaries.verdict: Easily adjustable shades that roll down and suction to your car window.
pros: Includes 2 shades that extend to a maximum 16 inches by 24 inches
Each shade attaches to your car window with 3 suction cups
Easy to use and the shades can be easily adjusted to different lengths
Easy to see through when checking your blind spot while driving
cons: Some had trouble getting the suction cups to attach

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to install and remove. Keeps my little ones' eyes from the sun and supplies the car with the so needed shade on those hot sunny days. Price is reasonable and good quality. Simple, but fills its cause.
customer_reviews.author: RonBY

customer_reviews.title: Probably the fanciest shade available
customer_reviews.text: Impression: Got this because I got fed up with shades that kept falling off the window on to my son. Can’t get any more secure than using the hooks and rolling up the window! It pulls down and rolls up, which makes it look fancy Pros: -Most secure shade available -Surprisingly high quality automatic roll up feature -Decent sun blockage -Numerous options to hang up, including suction cups and stickers Cons: -Hooks do stick out a little outside the window -Doesn’t cover the whole window, although I didn’t need it to
customer_reviews.author: Space Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: All the Suction Cups Don’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried cleaning the window and applying a little water to the suction cups, but they lose suction within 15 minutes. It is day one, so they should work. But all of them appear deformed upon arrival. I will give it a few days before I actually make the decision to return.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with a pouch to keep if you don’t need it. We use it for the kids to keep them from the sun especially this summer. I have only 3 stars because I wish they were wider to fill up the whole window Update: it keeps on falling and it’s useless now.
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! There are 2 and they come just like the picture. They are easy to attach to the window with the suction cups that are included. They can be pulled down all the way or at different intervals. They have a button on the side that retracts them easily. There is also a nice drawstring bag to store them in when they are not in use! Highly recommend to anyone with kids and no tint on their car windows!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these shades! They are super easy to install, are well made, and do a good job of filtering the sun. They are larger than I expected which is a plus. I use them on a window in my home that the sun shines through right on me all afternoon. I like the fact that they go up and down on a spring roller just like a blind does, no need to take them down when you don’t need them for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Schow

customer_reviews.title: Car Window Sunshade
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I didn't really check the spec/info for the make/model it supposed to fit. That being said, it did not fit my 2015 Nissan Sentra but it more or less fits my 2017 Dodge charger, with a little bit of adjustment needed. The shade is dark enough for sunlight coverage, but not too much to get you in trouble with the Law. Installation is fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Marthe Aspilaire

customer_reviews.title: 😕
customer_reviews.text: We had to return the first order. When we opened the package they came out in pieces. Returned and The second pair work fine. But, found the identical item at Target for $9.99.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a cheap product. I really wanted it to work but it was already damaged when I received it. As soon as I opened one of them, it was ripped on the side. The plastic feels cheap and I don’t like the two shades (one side black and one side white). It would be nice if both sides were black. It’s also not long enough to cover the whole window, you have to find the right spots to place them and just settle with it. The pros are that it’s easy to install and it comes in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: mzwenc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount with white color in or out
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as described and mounts easily with the white color outside and the black color inside. I want the black inside and the white outside to keep the compartment cooler and to see better from inside to outside. You can do this by flipping the top bar 180 degrees and sliding the suction cups into the two upside-down widow clips against the window. I put a VERY light coating of WD40 on the glass-facing suction cup surfaces to improve adhesion. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: These are a complete joke and waste of money ! Doesn't even cover half of the window and it only extends about 3 more inches ... Plus, the Velcro piece that allows you to lower or raise the blind, broke, and I wasn't even able to put the blind on the window yet . Ordered this to keep sun out of my child's face when we drive, but it won't even keep sunlight out of half the window . Returning for a refund and I'll find somewhere else to purchase it .
customer_reviews.author: Succulents

customer_reviews.title: Smelled Like Burning Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work okay, although it doesn't cover a large area of the window. Also, when it first arrived, it had a really strong smell of burning plastic - it was nauseating. After about two months, that smell seems to have gone away. It pulls down and retracts easily. However, the piece that attaches to the door already fell off for one side. I think for the coverage, this wasn't really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay DTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made,  break very easy!
customer_reviews.text: These sunshade are cheaply made. Installing the first one the spring roller inside broke. Threw it away. Second one managed to work ok. But after about 3 days. The suction cups wouldn't suction anymore. Went to hobby lobby and bought a few more suction cups to use. As these were deformed after a few days. Stayed on for about a month but never moved it. When I did decide to retract the bling. The plastic pieces inside the spring roller portion broke down just like the first one. I would not recommend buying these. They are so cheaply made that the first time you use them, they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hoke

customer_reviews.title: Two ways of using it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. It brings two window sunshades with multiples suction cups so you could either place the shades in the window with them or just place the sunshades with the little hook that’s attacked on it. So you have two ways of using it!!🙌
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Batista

customer_reviews.title: Keep your seats from getting too hot
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put a shade on your dashboard, but that doesn't keep your seats from getting painfully hot if the sun primarily hits your car from the sides. Most side shades are suction cupped to the window. They work, but putting them on securely and taking them off requires some time. I'm also planning to use them in the winter to prevent frost on the windows if I have an early morning departure.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S

customer_reviews.title: Convenient auto side window retractable shades
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and effective auto window shade. Purchased to block annoying sun on the driver and front passenger side windows. Adjustable suction or window attachment clips allow for flexible installation on custom window shapes. Compliments sun visor use on side window. Includes extension/retraction feature for easy sun blocking modifications.
customer_reviews.author: CBX123

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: Great screens and do a great job keeping sun out, but DON'T TRY TO DRIVE WITH THEM ON YOUR FRONT WINDOWS. You cannot see through them for driving safely. Only issue for me is that when I lower my window they have a tendency to fall, which isn't good if you're racing down the interstate. But they really help block sun when the car is parked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: i was totally dissatisfied with these window coverings, the suction does not stick, the clips keep popping off and the shade keeps sliding down once you get it up on the window. also when press the button to retract the shade; the whole darn things falls down. this item is truly not worth it, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: veronica j.

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my vehicle mainly to keep the sun away from my baby. They work well. Very easy to install and easy to remove, if needed. The suction cups work well. I keep two (one slightly overlapping the other) on one side in order to get the whole area to be covered from the sun. These are useful. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: M'sh

customer_reviews.title: Mine fell apart/after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- mine fell apart after approximately 3 weeks at most / They never would go up and down ,like a shade is suppose to ,,,(stayed in down position) just buy ones that u stick to window-and peel rite off-go rite back on wen needed - Work great,, just wish they were a little bigger but they do the trick I will buy another set for the other window ,,, my Grandson gets very carsick specially when he looks out the window
customer_reviews.author: BlueDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Sienna drivers, don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really disliked the 10000 extra suction cups. How about just give me some that “suck” not ones that fold defectively. I cannot get the shade to stay on the window. Also if you have a mini van, this isn’t for you. Get something wider. Toyota Sienna driver here
customer_reviews.author: Clint N.

customer_reviews.title: Does not adhere to rear windows with defrost wire lines running through the glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought four, two for each side window and two for the rear window. The two on the side windows worked great and I never had a problem with the suction power. The two in the rear windows would not stick. I believe it is due to the defrost wiring running through the glass. I'd like to return them but don't see an option on Amazon to do so. I bought them in June for a month-long road trip and the time may have passed for return options.
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These things barely do anything. I ended up having to hang a blanket over the window and roll it up to get the sun out of my sons eyes. So frustrating to be driving and see your child fussing because the light is in his face. I tried adjusting several times to try and block the light and it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Genessa L

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t shield sun effectively though were easy to see through. Didn’t retract easily if at all. Suction week and repeatedly fell from window
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Measure your windows before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and as described in the ad. They are well made but too large for my compact sedan's small passenger windows. Make sure you measure your vehicle's windows before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase for us
customer_reviews.text: Either mine came broken or you have to manually roll it back up once you’ve pulled it down. Doesn’t seem well made at all. Very thin material doesn’t block a ton, I would definitely return if I could but waited too long to try.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: It provides protection in spite of downsides.
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is good at the beginning, but start to get weaker after a couple of months. The adhesive square to receive the Velcro didn’t attached well to the surface of the door and fell out of the car after two weeks. The main purpose of the shades is accomplished though and I keep using them loose.
customer_reviews.author: Josemanuel Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap esp with all the ratings. Mine broke the moment I pulled down the shade. It won’t rewind. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great screens they are just too heavy for the suction cups
customer_reviews.text: Awesome material, love the push button, well made but wouldn't stay on the window for longer than a few seconds no matter what I did. They give you LOTS of extra suction cups so I tried several different ones and different windows but they wouldn't stay on. I loved the material.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for road trips. My eyes are sun sensitive, these are great for me when I am riding as passenger. I really like the that they roll up when not in use, can leave on all the time. Also plan on using in the summer to help keep sun and heat out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, stay in place, and great shade!
customer_reviews.text: These sun shades stretch to fit both the front doors and larger back doors on my car. Thanks to the Velcro attachment system, they stay in place while driving, and they offer great protection from the sun’s rays! Considering a second set for all of our windows.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Recoil of spring
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it one of the shade's spring wouldn't work. It only rewinds halfway. The other one is perfect. Tight spring and recoil. They do also make it harder to see into the car when I want to hide and leave something in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jilllane

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Shade fell off the drivers window when I rolled the window down a bit, and violently disassembled itself when it hit the ground. Which was fine, because the retraction mechanism stopped working after the first use anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jennerman

customer_reviews.title: Car Window Covers
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to use, just slip them over the car door. When I use these on my car it is not as hot and they are super durable. I really love these too because you can just easily pull them off and throw them in your car. Nothing more nothing less. I would definitely buy this again, this a great and affordable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sisi M.

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: Roller hardly works. Impossible to get back up. Pitched in trash after first use
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and keeps babies carseat from getting too hot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shades, but the only thing I didn't like was that the Velcro part that attaches to the window wouldn't stay stuck. I don't know if it was because it's been so hot or what. I was able to use 1 of the extra suction cups to attach the shade to at the bottom instead of the Velcro. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: They Do the Job
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these handy items come with extra suction cups, but they also arrive in a well made carry and storage bag. All this and at an affordable price; thanks seller. I'll use you again one day.
customer_reviews.author: The Garth

customer_reviews.title: Provides great shade!
customer_reviews.text: These window sunshades provide nice shade for my car. My car windows are lightly tinted so the sun shines a lot through it making it hot but these shades block out the sun rays. I can still see through it too so, it doesn’t interfere with the window view.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Great item I use it for the back windows in my car for my baby. It's so easy to use keep the Sun out and you have the option of opening and closing it
customer_reviews.author: Take-Air

customer_reviews.title: What there is of these works well
customer_reviews.text: These do provide the shade but they were much smaller than I expected. Only covered a portion of my Highlanders door windows. The suction cups did not last during a ten our trip. Had to re-suction several times.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Blah..
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy sucker. Some of them work well others don't. It's a hit or miss.. Even if u wet the sucker.. And then put pressure to make stick. Winters are even worse.. Summers will make them stock better though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Dude

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Not Great, Not Awful
customer_reviews.text: While these shades come with adhesive Velcro strips, the adhesive quickly loses its grip in a hot car. The suction cups work best, but then it’s not really feasible to easily raise the lower the shade. It’s an okay product, but I’d probably opt for a static cling sticker shade next time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Luther

customer_reviews.title: Shades for my sunroof
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, it looked like the suctions were not going to last after a few hours. A week after and it still holding. My sunshade motor stopped working and it was going to cost $700 to get it fixed. Vegas heat is not forgiving with my black leather seats. As. DIY fix, we bought the shades, and it is doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Velcro does not stick
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I loved the retractable shade. I quickly found (within a week or two) that the sticky part of the velcro (the part that sticks to the window) melts off in hot weather. It leaves a very sticky residue on the window and randomly comes off while I am driving. This should either be another suction cup at the bottom or some other type of fixture. h=Happy with the shade, not happy with the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: KMcGowan

customer_reviews.title: They need to re-roll when I’m driving
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shades but once unrolled i can’t get them to roll back up, would think they would act like any shade, pull and it opens, pull and it closes but they don’t close
customer_reviews.author: ZOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was too narrow for the window but once the baby was kn the car, worked perfectly. So easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: solomka20

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. It slips right over the door and then there is a Velcro strip that holds it in place. I really like that you can still open the window while it shades the car. Seems to hold up well to weather so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ymker

customer_reviews.title: Very good sun blocker
customer_reviews.text: I think this a very good shade and sun blocker. It does block out the sun very well. The only issue is I wish the shade was big enough to block the whole window.
customer_reviews.author: K.P

customer_reviews.title: Suction Plastic holder broke
customer_reviews.text: Works but the construction is flimsy. The plastic holder for the suction broke. You’re better off buying something a little pricier but sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Psilo

customer_reviews.title: Won’t roll back up
customer_reviews.text: The first use, one of my shades won’t roll back up. It was only pulled down about 1/4-1/2 of the way (I drive a Mini Cooper-small windows). Now it just flops around- garbage.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givo

customer_reviews.title: Not  good long term use. Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for sun screen. At beginning it work fine. But recently one of sucker is deform due to expose to sun too much. And it no longer hold on window.it not longer working, for longer investment this is not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: xin zheng

customer_reviews.title: Sun blocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister to provide extra protection for my little niece car rides. This Provided the perfect shade needed to block sun light. No more sun in the baby face. My sister Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Handy, very useful
customer_reviews.text: Those car side windows are really handy, specially at this Summer time. They help me to keep my car less hot and protects my grocery purchases from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for families
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they come in a bag for storage which was a pleasant surprise. The inside is white so the kid at the window can still see all the sights. I really like they are barely visible from the outside. Very easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These sunshades worked for about 3 or 4 weeks until one of the key attachment pieces broke as I was pulling down the shades in the car. It is now rendered useless as they piece of plastic was essential. I would not recommend this product I’d you are looking for something that is somewhat durable.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Basically a good design but...
customer_reviews.text: So you attach this to the top of your window glass. You then put the window up. When you bring the window down the top retainers remain jammed into the top of the door/window frame.. Everything else falls to the floor. Then, if you are more unfortunate the top holders loosen up and fly away. There are lots of spare bits in the bag but no spare top attachment clips.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER S SMYTH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Perfect in my car for the kids. No more complaining the sun is in their eyes. They were easy to install and perfect for keeping the sun out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: alexa h markiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My office has this old tall narrow window that is great, however I am on the eastern side of the building and 1st thing in the am the sunshine hits my PC just right and I cannot see a thing. I put these in the window and now can read what comes up on my monitor without doing acrobatics lol.
customer_reviews.author: James Matheson

customer_reviews.title: Surface Colors wrong.
customer_reviews.text: They were put together wrong. The white side was on the inside surface and the black side was on the outside surface. They should have been assembled opposite. Could not figiure out how to switch them, so we returned them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality suction cup.
customer_reviews.text: quality of suction cup is very good, it also come with several spare suction cup. everything work well of this units, roll up fine,
customer_reviews.author: Agness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips, cooler summers and kids!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Texas and if you don’t know already our summers are HOT! This is perfect to help keep your car cool during those high temp months! It’s also great for road trips and children!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.text: Well first off it got here alot quicker than I expected, the packaging was simple and straight to the point. Mine did not come with instructions but the product is super simple to put together and takes only a couple minutes to assemble and install...has a convenient button to quickly retract the shade and it comes with extra suction cups which are always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade
customer_reviews.text: This fit my suv window perfectly. It stops the sun from completely beaming in my LO’s face. I’ve recommended this product to friends too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought these ages ago! These shades are super easy to install and use. They are effective at blocking the sun without blocking the view. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Came in a two pack, good thing because one was broken within the first week. I’ve already gone through 3 suction cups that quickly stopped adhering to the window. Crappy product! Too bad because it was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Weber

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stick as well I hoped. But works well enough
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Church

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something to help cool my back seats for my kids because where we live is hitting over a hundred degrees already. Love this sunshade bc it helps blockout some sun. Suction cups are great. Love how it rolls so I don’t have to pull the whole thing off if it’s no longer needed.
customer_reviews.author: HcAz

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. Easy to use. But pain in the butt to lower the windows once it's on. Bc it hangs over the window glass, lowering the window (with the shade up) might cause the whole thing to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Perez

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the sun and helps make your vehicle cooler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Blocks the sun for passenger comfort and helps keep the interior cooler. Also helps block the sun when the sun is below the visor.
customer_reviews.author: bitterham

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! My baby HATES the sun, and it’s been amazing to ride in the vehicle without him screaming and crying because the suns in his eyes. It’s a really great product and I’m so thankful for TWO! one for daddy’s car too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These shades are easy all around! Easy to install, easy to pull and release, easy to attach to suction cups or Velcro options, and an easy option for keeping your little one safe from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade, spring didn't hold up against 4yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shades, however they lasted just 3 days. One came with a spring that wasn't functioning, but I only needed one, so I kept them. The spring on the other broke on the 3rd day when my son pulled on it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Did not retract!
customer_reviews.text: The product had good suction, was easy to install & use but the retractable mechanism did not work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Cookies

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They serve the purpose for the window in our camper. Unfortunately on the 3rd use one of the springs busted so the shade won’t roll up.
customer_reviews.author: john hoynacki

customer_reviews.title: nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: nice product to have extra sunshade for the car window, very easy to install, and chose the way that you like to install them. But somehow the sticker at the bottom is easy to pull off, that's why I gave it as 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed for my car, just wish my front windows didn't have such a tapering off so it could hang straight.
customer_reviews.author: Desinger1

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as good as I expected on front side windows. Can’t use brackets, only suction cups
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Su

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: After using them for several days I found that if you hook them to the windows they won't close completely, water will leak through the top of the window when at the car wash. The little square sticky's that hold the shade down don't work. The suction cups get loose when you close the door a few time, you have to keep sticking it on again.
customer_reviews.author: henry hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. The first one in a set of two broke immediately. (You couldn't pull the shade down.) I submitted a claim, and was promptly shipped a replacement with no hassles and no questions asked. Comically, one of the replacement shades were broken too. Now that we have a working set, we really like them. The shades are easy to use and the suction cups work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: not good for modern cars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these due to ease of just rolling it up. However, where it attached on top of the window interferes with the auto roll up/down function, so can't use. Also, not enough coverage, needs to be wider.
customer_reviews.author: carmela eager

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I need to order another set of these, my kids love these for when it’s too bright and the sun shines on their tablet screens.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to install the suction caps and they work very well. This is a good value
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose! Button on side rolls it back up easily. Sticky velcro patch to put on door that hold its down...blended in nicely since our doors interior is black
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Don't pull down on the shade portion too hard or too far.
customer_reviews.text: Got these a month ago, one stopped retracting already :( I got them to shade the car backseat for my daughters. They seemed to be more durable and of better quality than a set I bought on eBay a few years ago, but I'm disappointed one has broken so soon after purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after few months...
customer_reviews.text: They were very easy. After a few months they came off the rod and were repairable.
customer_reviews.author: Xochitl

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: They were good for sun protection but mine broke after a couple of uses. The spring just came out and the rod fell off. Not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Garin Egbers

customer_reviews.title: Will not retract back in
customer_reviews.text: They block the sun well and have nice suction cups. Once retracted, they will not go back in. Both of them are this way.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Tried the stick on version which I wasn't found of. Exactly as described and holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups are really poor quality. They warp very easily. That may be a consequence of the heat of the tropical climate I live in, but I cant say. Otherwise, it's pretty easy to use, pretty easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but not better, because it can only block part of the sun, and can't block the entire window, the sun will still shine on the baby's face.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great but missing one piece
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, works great, unfortunately one of the clips is missing from package, trying to contact seller to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D.

customer_reviews.title: N.E.X.T
customer_reviews.text: Back window sunshade does not stay attatched. The side window shades do not stay in place and often when I role the back window up they fall
customer_reviews.author: Brian Burns

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The tabs that hold the shade to the window broke immediately
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kolton

customer_reviews.title: Suction cap
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I could pull the shade up and down to adjust to my needs and I like that it is not a solid shade that you can't see through it. Only complaint I have the the suction cap. Even if we received extra suction cap all but two really sticks. I have to use a scotch tape to hold it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Shade Time
customer_reviews.text: l love these, fit perfect, thank you for having these...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep cool!
customer_reviews.text: These came well packaged and ready to install. They installed easily and stay in place, providing good shade during our hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Omg love this product. Keeps the back seats cool in the summer. Easy to install. But be sure its pulled down so when you put the windows up it doesn't get caught. I have an suv so it fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tammy f

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Funny how the window return time was only one month. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: Lebrisa Designs

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This helps my keep the sun out of our child's eyes! Love it! We clipped it. We don't hear the air when on the freeway as another reviewer posted.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent shading area
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature is that I can attach the top hangers to the window top and the bottom of the shade to the adhesive tape on the window panel, this provides a decent shading area from top to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: Car Side Window Sunshades - 2 Pack. Universal Roller Blind to Protect Baby, Kids, Pets and Passengers in the Back Seat from Harmful UV Rays and Heat. For a Cooler Car. Easy to Install. By Barucci
product_meta.description:
Size:MediumDriving with children can be difficult. Driving with kids in the heat is so much worse. Protecting the baby, toddlers and other passengers is your responsibility. Keeping them cool and protected from the sun’s harmful rays is easy with the Barucci car side window sunshades. 

Not only do these sunshades protect the children and pets while they are riding in the car, they also help to deflect the hot sun away from the car while it is parked so getting into the car on a hot day is far less traumatic. 

In this set you receive: 2 pack roller shade, car retractable side window shades - made of durable plastic 5 Rubber Suction Cups - 3 for installation and 2 extras 1 plastic carry case 

The shades are made of High Quality PVC Plastic film with no holes and of the correct density to ensure visibility through the shade and out of the window. They will not deteriorate from sunlight. 

So easy to install and uninstall that a 5 year old can do it although we do recommend preparing for the ride in advance. Just remove the shade from the carry case we provide and stick the shade (with the suction caps) on the window. Pull down and secure in any position with the 3rd suction cap. It takes less than a minute! When you want to put it away, release the suction caps and store in the carrier. It couldn’t be easier. 

At 16 x 24 inches and weighing just 10.5 oz. this shade is universal and will fit any car, truck, SUV or minivan. You can store the shades in the car for easy access or in the trunk. 

NEVER LEAVE PETS OR CHILDREN UNATTENDED IN YOUR VEHICLE! 

BUY NOW and enjoy a 15% Discount on your second set. This offer is limited so don’t wait. There is NO RISK. If for any reason you are not happy simply return within 30 days for a FULL REFUND. Our customer service is always available.
feature_bullets: MUST HAVE PROTECTION FOR YOUR BABY! The sun’s rays are dangerous and car windows let in not only light but also harmful UV rays. The Barucci set of 2 retractable sunshades are especially important when you are carrying an infant in your back seat. They make the environment in your car, minivan, truck or SUV so much more comfortable and they also protect your pets and adult passengers.

NO HASSLE INVOLVED - 16 x 24 inches, light and so easy to install that even your 5 year old can do it so you get to concentrate on driving and not worrying about whether or not the kids are comfortable in the back. Just 3 suction pads and you’re set to go. When they are not in use just put them away easily in the handy carry bag we provide.

WORRY FREE! THEY ARE LONG LASTING AND DURABLE - Made from high quality mesh plastic. They will not disintegrate in the sun’s heat. The Baby roller shades for cars are adjustable so your passenger can decide how much or how little shade they need.

ESSENTIAL CAR ACCESSORY for anyone who wants to protect their children, pets and passengers but also to protect the upholstery on their back seat. Fabric seats will fade from strong sunlight and plastic or leather will dry and crack. Save heartache and expensive re-upholstery with this simple, inexpensive and effective gadget.

A GREAT GIFT from grandparents to moms and dads. You’ve bought everything the grandkids could possibly want or need. This is a health essential for the kids and peace of mind for mom and dad. BUY NOW and keep the harmful rays of the sun away from your loved ones. This is a NO-RISK purchase. If you are unhappy in any way, return within 30 days for a FULL REFUND.
